description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on January 19, 2023 at 14:00EST. The requirement is only open to Task and Solution Professional Services Supply Arrangement (TSPS SA) holders under Stream 1 human resources, who qualified under Tier 1 at the time of bid closing. The contract will be established on an as and when requested basis for a period of two years plus two one-year irrevocable option periods.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal (RFP) for Solution-Based Professional Services

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for a Solution-Based Professional Services contract under the Task and Solution Professional Services Supply Arrangement (TSPS SA) # E60ZT-16TSSB/E.

### Solicitation Details

*   **Reference Number:** WS3798818406-Doc3799299718
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3798818406
*   **Publication Date:** 2022-12-21
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-19T14:00:00 (EST)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None

### Contract Requirements

The successful bidder will be required to provide Solution-Based Professional Services on an "as and when requested" basis for a period of two years, with two one-year irrevocable option periods allowing PSPC to extend the contract term.

### Eligibility Criteria

This RFP is open only to contractors who hold a TSPS SA # E60ZT-16TSSB/E under Stream 1 Human Resources, having qualified under Tier 1 at the time of bid closing.

### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the Lowest Cost-per-Point (LCP) criteria.

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this solicitation is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or further information, please contact Benoit Fournel-Trepanier, SPAC/PSPC, at benoit.fournel-trepanier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Notice and Attachments

The full notice and solicitation documents can be found on [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14952613?extsite=MTQ5NTI2MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14952613?extsite=MTQ5NTI2MTNfQU4wMT
